name: high-impact-banner-display-and-dismiss;issue-lt-218-issue-lt-219-issue-lt-220-site-navigation-regression-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt26-site-navigation-lt-141-high-impact-banner-capability-lt-26-site-navigation

tags.name: LT 26 Site Navigation/LT-141 High Impact Banner

title: High Impact Banner Display and Dismiss

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then user should see High Impact Banner with name "Bobbin Head Cycle Classic - Sunday 29 March - TURRAMURRA, KUR-RING-GAI CHASE NATIONAL PARK, ST IVES Bobbin Head Rd, Mona Vale Rd"
When user clicks on High Impact Banner with name "Bobbin Head Cycle Classic - Sunday 29 March - TURRAMURRA, KUR-RING-GAI CHASE NATIONAL PARK, ST IVES Bobbin Head Rd, Mona Vale Rd"
When I choose Hide map options
Then user should see incident "title" as "Bobbin Head Cycle Classic - Sunday 29 March" and "headline" as "Special Event"
When user close the High Imapact Banner
Then user should not see Banner with name "Bobbin Head Cycle Classic - Sunday 29 March - TURRAMURRA, KUR-RING-GAI CHASE NATIONAL PARK, ST IVES Bobbin Head Rd, Mona Vale Rd"
